alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 12 at 11:08AM CDT until May 12 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by previous excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Arkansas, including the following counties, Hempstead, Howard and Nevada. * WHEN...Until 100 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1106 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms is tapering off quickly. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen previously this morning and this could continue to cause some minor urban and small stream flooding over the next few hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hope, Prescott, Emmet, Blevins, Perrytown, Washington, Bluff City, Oakhaven, Boughton, Laneburg and Morris. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
